StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [UpdateImportPersonStagingStatusForDuplicates]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @ImportEventId uniqueiden..er ) AS BEGIN
-- DECLARE @ImportEventId UNIQUEIDENTIFIER -- SET @ImportEventId = 'B30F4CDA-18B5-4D2A-B088-669CF41B2D23'
CREATE TABLE #TEMP_PERSON_FIND ( ImportPersonStagingId UNIQUEIDENTIFIER ,PersonId UNIQUEIDENTIFIER ,ProspectId UNIQUEIDENTIFIER ,LastUpdateDate DATETIME )
CREATE TABLE #TEMP_PERSON ( ImportPersonStagingId UNIQUEIDENTIFIER ,PersonId UNIQUEIDENTIFIER ,ProspectId UNIQUEIDENTIFIER ,ImportStatusID INT )
INSERT INTO #TEMP_PERSON_FIND SELECT IPS.ImportPersonStagingId, PP.PersonId, PRO.ProspectId, PRO.LastUpdateDate FROM [UPLOAD].ImportPersonStaging IPS WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN [USMC].PersonPhone PP WITH (NOLOCK) ON IPS.Phone = PP.PhoneNumber AND PP.LastUpdateDate IN ( SELECT MAX(PP2.LastUpdateDate) FROM USMC.PersonPhone PP2 WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE PP.PersonId = PP2.PersonId) AND PP.PhoneNumber IS NOT NULL AND PP.PhoneNumber <> '' AND IPS.Phone <> '' AND IPS.Phone IS NOT NULL INNER JOIN [USMC].Person P WITH (NOLOCK) ON PP.PersonID = P.PersonID AND P.LASTNAME = IPS.LastName AND p.FirstName = IPS.FirstName INNER JOIN [USMC].Prospect PRO WITH (NOLOCK) ON P.PersonID = PRO.PersonId WHERE IPS.ImportEventId = @ImportEventId AND IPS.ImportStatusID <> 5
INSERT INTO #TEMP_PERSON SELECT TPF.ImportPersonStagingId, TPF.PersonId, TPF.ProspectId, 7 FROM #TEMP_PERSON_FIND TPF WHERE LastUpdateDate IN ( SELECT MAX(TPF2.LastUpdateDate) FROM #TEMP_PERSON_FIND TPF2 WHERE TPF.ImportPersonStagingId = TPF2.ImportPersonStagingId)
UPDATE TP SET TP.ImportStatusID = 8 FROM #TEMP_PERSON TP INNER JOIN USMC.Person P WITH (NOLOCK) ON TP.PersonId = P.PersonId WHERE SocialSecurityNumber IS NOT NULL
UPDATE TP SET TP.ImportStatusID = 8 FROM #TEMP_PERSON TP INNER JOIN USMC.Prospect P WITH (NOLOCK) ON TP.PersonId = P.PersonId WHERE ProspectDisposi.onId <> 1 AND TP.ImportStatusID <> 8
UPDATE TP SET TP.ImportStatusID = 8 FROM #TEMP_PERSON TP INNER JOIN USMC.PersonAddress PA WITH (NOLOCK) ON TP.PersonId = PA.PersonId WHERE CITY_CODE IS NOT NULL OR COUNTY_CODE IS NOT NULL OR STATE_CODE IS NOT NULL AND TP.ImportStatusID <> 8
UPDATE TP SET TP.ImportStatusID = 8 FROM #TEMP_PERSON TP INNER JOIN USMC.PersonEmail PE WITH (NOLOCK) ON TP.PersonId = PE.PersonId AND PE.LastUpdateDate IN ( SELECT MAX(PE2.LastUpdateDate) FROM USMC.PersonEmail PE2 WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE PE.PersonId = PE2.PersonId) WHERE TP.ImportStatusID <> 8
UPDATE TP SET TP.ImportStatusID = 8 FROM #TEMP_PERSON TP INNER JOIN USMC.ProspectComment PC WITH (NOLOCK) ON TP.ProspectId = PC.ProspectId AND PC.LastUpdateDate IN ( SELECT MAX(PC2.LastUpdateDate) FROM USMC.ProspectComment PC2 WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE PC.ProspectId = PC2.ProspectId) WHERE TP.ImportStatusID <> 8
UPDATE TP SET TP.ImportStatusID = 8 FROM #TEMP_PERSON TP INNER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.EventSubject ES WITH (NOLOCK) ON TP.PersonId = ES.SubjectId INNER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.Event E WITH (NOLOCK) ON ES.EventId = E.Id AND E.LastUpdateDate IN ( SELECT MAX(E2.LastUpdateDate) FROM RSSOSS.USMC.EventSubject ES2 WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.Event E2 WITH (NOLOCK) ON ES.EventId = E2.Id WHERE ES.Id = ES2.Id) WHERE TP.ImportStatusID <> 8
UPDATE IPS SET IPS.ImportStatusID = TP.ImportStatusID FROM #TEMP_PERSON TP INNER JOIN [UPLOAD].ImportPersonStaging IPS ON TP.ImportPersonStagingId = IPS.ImportPersonStagingId
DROP TABLE #TEMP_PERSON DROP TABLE #TEMP_PERSON_FIND END
